content: Luís Antunes Veiga's Homepage Luís Antunes Veiga's Homepage Home · You are here Welcome to my homepage! About Me Associate Professor of the Computer Science and Engineering Department (DEI) at Instituto Superior Técnico - Technical University of Lisbon (December 2015-) previously Assistant Professor: March 2007 to December 2015 previously Teaching Assistant and Lecturer: March 2001 to March 2007 Visiting Researcher in IBM Research Europe - Zurich Lab with the Hybrid Cloud Research Department, in the context of the CloudStars project (Feb-Apr 2023) Member of the Scientific Council of IST (2023-) Vice-Head of Department, Computer Science and Engineering Department, Academic Matters (2021-2022) Coordinator, Master of Science programme in Information Systems and Computer Engineering (MEIC) at the Alameda and Taguspark IST campi (2017-2020) Scientific Coordinator, Distributed Parallel and Secure Systems Research Area of INESC-ID Lisboa (2020-2021). Senior Researcher with the Distributed Systems Group of INESC-ID Lisboa (2000-). Senior Member of the IEEE, Computer Society. Member of the ACM and ACM EuroSys. Research Interests Distributed systems, Virtual machines, Cloud and Grid computing, Data replication, Garbage collection, Peer-to-peer systems, Mobile middleware Teaching (Undergraduate) Cloud Computing and Virtualization (CNV) at MEIC, METI and MECD Virtual Execution Environments (AVExe) at MEIC-Alameda Middleware for Distributed Systems (PADI) at MEIC-Tagus/METI Operating Systems Teaching (Graduate) Operating Systems, Virtualization and Cloud Computing (OSVCC) at PhD (PDEIC) Advanced Virtualization Techniques (TAVM) at PhD (PDEIC) Outreach and Teaching Skills at PhD (PDEIC) Homepage at IST Recent News and Results Nominated for Best Researcher Award for 2019 at INESC-ID Lisboa.
